title: AI Studio
description: Create clips and memes from your recordings with AI

recordingDeleted.title: Recording Deleted
recordingDeleted.message: The original recording has been deleted. You can still view the AI-generated content.

emptyState.title: No AI requests yet
emptyState.description: Go to your recordings and click the AI button to create clips and memes

create.title: Create AI Request
create.description: Select what you want to generate from this recording
create.selectOptions: What would you like to create?

clips.label: Generate Clips
clips.description: AI will find the best moments and create short clips

memes.label: Generate Memes
memes.description: AI will create meme-worthy screenshots with captions

profile.label: Generate Profile
profile.description: AI will analyze and suggest profile improvements

sizeWarning.title: Video too large
sizeWarning.message: This video is {size}GB. Videos larger than 2GB need to be processed in parts.

status.title: AI Request Status
status.description: Track the progress of your AI request

upgrade.title: Turn Long Videos into Viral Clips
upgrade.subtitle: Let AI find the best moments from your recordings

features.clips: Auto-generate short clips from long recordings
features.memes: Create viral memes with AI-generated captions
features.viral: Optimized for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts

upgrade.hint: Unlock AI Studio with a premium subscription
